        Parameters:
        senderAddress - the address of the sender
        recipientAddress - the address of the recipient
        mailSubject - the subject of the mail
        mailMessage - the message of the mail
        encryptedPassword - the encrypted password
        smtpHost - the smtp host server
        port - the port of the server
        smtpAuth - the smtp authentication
        smtpPort - the smto port
